headline: NCLH Q1 Earnings Call: Bookings Choppiness and Cost Discipline Shape Cruise Outlook
summary: Cruise company Norwegian Cruise Line (NYSE:NCLH) fell short of the market’s revenue expectations in Q1 CY2025, with sales falling 2.9% year on year to $2.13 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $0.07 per share was 23.8% below analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Topgolf Callaway Q1 Earnings Surpass Estimates, Revenues Fall Y/Y
summary: MODG's Q1 top line reflects soft contributions from the Topgolf, Golf Equipment and Active Lifestyle segments.
